about_the_game:
This expansion features two parts: a game mod for new games and extra content for any playthrough.

The game mod, suggested for experienced players, randomize the islands positions, allowing a different map on every new playthrough.

The extra content, automatically unlocked in any game, will introduce you to four colorful greedy miners who will gladly sell you 3 houses equipped with teleportation devices and 30 unique building blocks to further customize your world!
